title: CNC Plasma Sign - Custom Logo
description: Custom logo sign cut via CNC plasma. Challenge: achieving clean edges on tight corners. Success: mastered lead/lag technique to prevent bevel cutting.

title: Aluminum Enclosure Box
description: Electronics enclosure with sealed corners. Challenge: precision bending to exact angles. Success: zero-rework assembly with custom corner fixtures.

title: Steel Bracket Assembly
description: Heavy-duty bracket for shop equipment. Challenge: threading holes without misalignment. Success: fixture-based drilling ensured perfect symmetry.

title: Decorative Wall Panel
description: Geometric pattern panel for interior design. Challenge: cutting intricate designs without warping. Success: optimized torch speed and nesting strategy.

title: Custom Frame - Laser Cut
description: Picture frame with precision laser etching. Challenge: preventing heat distortion on thin gauge. Success: mastered cooling techniques and material selection.
